title: Q**
content: This was my first experience providing tech support to users and helped me gain experience with customer service.

title: M**
tasks: Creating new users in AD and Microsoft Exchange
Travelling to site for face-to-face support
content: This job gave me my first exposure to the mining industry, I was given the opportunity to fly out to mine sites and provide ICT support.

title: T**
tasks: Creating new users in Active Directory and Microsoft Exchange
content: This was my first ICT support role which helped me get into the ICT industry.

title: K**
tasks: Providing technical support via phone call, emails and in person
Working on a busy service desk
Lodging tickets and escalating as needed
Creating new users in active directory
Assisted with upgrading business to Office 365 and Office 2016
Assisted with the migration to RDS/MFA (remote technology solutions)
Being able to quickly adjust to new sites when being moved to new contracts
content: Working at Kinetic IT gave me the opportunity to work on large and smaller service desks, I provided ICT support at; Department of Education, Landgate and BHP.

title: P**
tasks: Acknowledging if there's a trend in incidents
Rolling out laptops to new year groups
Assisted with the move to remote learning
content: Working at Perth College was very rewarding, being able to help students as well as staff with their ICT related problems as well as teach them how to use the technology. I would have loved to stay there but I wanted to chase my career goals.

title: I**
tasks: Develop new features for the application using C# and ASP.NET.
Use of Angular and REACT frameworks.
Completing tasks in SQL as required, such as creating and improving new tables, views, stored procedures, ETLs.
Creating SRSS reports to meet client's needs while following design guidelines.
Writing documentation on how to use application and release notes.
Finding and addressing bugs in application.
Creating quotes to meet client's needs.
Developing the application to meet client's needs.
content: My first developer role, I have learnt so much a lot about working as a developer and analyst, I've had the opportunity to work on projects for clients and deliver them to their satisfaction.
